numberRequired: Password must contain at least 1 number
specialRequired: Password must contain at least 1 special character
lowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
uppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
recoverPasswordMessage: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you an email code to reset your password.
successfulVerificationSubtitle: Your account has been successfully verified. Click below to go to the login page.
